TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit BinaryMessageEncodingBindingElement extends System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageEncodingBindingElement implements class System.ServiceModel.Description.IPolicyExportExtension, class System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension
Public NotInheritable Class BinaryMessageEncodingBindingElement Inherits MessageEncodingBindingElement Implements IPolicyExportExtension, IWsdlExportExtension
type BinaryMessageEncodingBindingElement = class inherit MessageEncodingBindingElement interface IWsdlExportExtension interface IPolicyExportExtension

summary.span: 用于指定编码消息时所采用的 .NET 二进制 XML 格式的绑定元素。

span.span: The binding element that specifies the .NET Binary Format for XML used to encode messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 编码是将消息转换为一个字节序列的过程。Encoding is the process of transforming a message into a sequence of bytes. 解码是反向过程。Decoding is the reverse process. Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 包含三种类型的 SOAP 消息编码：文本、二进制和消息传输优化机制 (MTOM)。Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) includes three types of encoding for SOAP messages: Text, Binary and Message Transmission Optimization Mechanism (MTOM). 是指定在编码消息时应该使用 .NET 二进制 XML 格式的绑定元素，它包含用于指定要使用何种字符编码以及 SOAP 与 WS-Addressing 版本的选项。The is the binding element that specified the .NET Binary Format for XML should be used for encoding messages, and has options to specify the character encoding and the SOAP and WS-Addressing version to be used. 二进制编码是效率最高但互操作性最低的编码选项。Binary encoding is most efficient but least interoperable of the encoding options. 有关指定的绑定元素的详细信息消息的文本表示形式的 XML 编码，请参阅。For more information about the binding element that specifies messages are encoded using a textual representation of XML, see . 消息编码使用 MTOM 消息编码绑定元素，指定有关详细信息，请参阅。For more information about the binding element that specifies messages are encoded using the MTOM message encoding, see . 若要实现自定义消息编码器，请使用 类。To implement a custom message encoder, use the class. ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UE_BinaryMessageEncodingBindingElement#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_binarymessageencodingbindingelement/cs/program.cs#0)] [!code-vb[S_UE_BinaryMessageEncodingBindingElement#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_binarymessageencodingbindingelement/vb/module1.vb#0)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement Clone() cil managed
Public Overrides Function Clone () As BindingElement

summary.span: 创建一个从当前对象初始化的新 对象。

span.span: Creates a new object initialized from the current one.

returns.span: 一个 对象，其属性值等于当前元素的属性值。

span.span: A object with property values equal to those of the current element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这将创建当前绑定元素对象树的完整副本，也称为深层克隆。This creates a complete copy of the current binding element object tree, also called a deep clone. 对象的深层克隆创建对象的副本以及该对象直接或间接引用的所有内容的副本。A deep clone of an object creates a copy of the object and a copy of everything directly or indirectly referenced by that object. 这也被描述为复制整个对象图。通过返回深层克隆，运行时将能够支持多个自定义绑定共用一个自定义绑定元素的情况。(This can also be described as copying the entire object graph.) Returning a deep clone enables the runtime to support the case in which multiple custom bindings share a custom binding element. 如果未返回深层克隆，则运行时行为将不可确定。If a deep clone is not returned, the runtime behavior is undefined. 相比之下，对象的浅表克隆只是对象本身的副本。A shallow clone of an object, by contrast, is a copy of the object only. 如果对象包含对其他对象的引用，则浅表复制不创建所引用对象的副本，而是仅复制对原始对象的引用。If the object contains references to other objects, the shallow copy does not create copies of the referred objects; instead, it copies only the references to the original objects. ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UE_BinaryMessageEncodingBindingElement#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_binarymessageencodingbindingelement/cs/program.cs#10)] [!code-vb[S_UE_BinaryMessageEncodingBindingElement#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_binarymessageencodingbindingelement/vb/module1.vb#10)]

summary.span: 为利用 SOAP 与 WS-Addressing 版本以及当前编码绑定元素指定的字符编码的二进制消息编码器，创建一个工厂。

span.span: Creates a factory for binary message encoders that employ the SOAP and WS-Addressing versions and the character encoding specified by the current encoding binding element.
The that this binding element creates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 工厂生成的 对象可以读取和写入使用二进制消息编码的消息。The objects that the factory produces can read and write messages using the binary message encoding. ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UE_BinaryMessageEncodingBindingElement#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_binarymessageencodingbindingelement/cs/program.cs#11)] [!code-vb[S_UE_BinaryMessageEncodingBindingElement#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_binarymessageencodingbindingelement/vb/module1.vb#11)]

summary.span: 从绑定元素堆栈的适当层返回所请求的类型化对象（如果存在）。

span.span: Returns a typed object requested, if present, from the appropriate layer in the binding element stack.

returns.span: 如果存在，则为所请求的类型化对象 ，如果不存在，则为 。

span.span: The typed object requested if it is present or if it is not.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法可请求从绑定元素堆栈的适当层返回一个用于设置属性或获取状态的类型化对象。Use this to request a typed object for setting properties or getting status from the appropriate layer in the binding element stack. 如果某个层支持返回所请求的对象，则该层会返回对象。If a layer supports returning the requested object, it returns it. 如果不支持，则该层会将调用委托给堆栈中的下一层。If not, it delegates the call down to the next layer in the stack. 如果到达堆栈底部仍然没有绑定元素层支持所请求的对象，则该方法返回 `null`。If it gets to the bottom of the stack and no binding element layer supported the requested object, then the method returns `null`. ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UE_BinaryMessageEncodingBindingElement#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_binarymessageencodingbindingelement/cs/program.cs#12)] [!code-vb[S_UE_BinaryMessageEncodingBindingElement#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_binarymessageencodingbindingelement/vb/module1.vb#12)]

member this.MaxReadPoolSize : int with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置最大 XML 读取器数，这些读取器将分配到池中，并随时可以用于处理传入消息。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of XML readers that are allocated to a pool and are ready for use to process incoming messages.

value.span: 要保留在池中的读取器的最大数量。

span.span: The maximum number of readers to be kept in the pool.

value.span: 默认值为 64 个读取器。

span.span: The default value is 64 readers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 增大此数字将会增加内存消耗，但能够让编码器处理传入消息的突现高峰，因为编码器可以使用池中已创建的读取器，而不必创建新的读取器。Increasing this number increases memory consumption, but prepares the encoder to deal with sudden bursts of incoming messages because it is able to use readers from the pool are already created instead of having to create new ones. ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UE_BinaryMessageEncodingBindingElement#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_binarymessageencodingbindingelement/cs/program.cs#2)] [!code-vb[S_UE_BinaryMessageEncodingBindingElement#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_binarymessageencodingbindingelement/vb/module1.vb#2)]

exception.span: 设置的值小于或等于零。

span.span: The value set is less than or equal to zero.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxSessionSize { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.MaxSessionSize : int with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置会话中的最大可用内存量，以优化传输过程。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum amount of memory available within a session for optimizing transmission procedures.

value.span: 会话的最大大小（以字节为单位）。

span.span: The maximum size, in bytes, of a session.
The default value is 2048 bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET 二进制 XML 格式可以对在会话中多条消息内使用的字符串的传输进行优化。The .NET Binary Format for XML can optimize the transmission of strings when they are used in multiple messages within a session. 在某条消息中发送字符串后，其他包含该字符串的消息便只可使用该字符串的 ID 对其进行引用。Once a string is sent in a message, additional messages that contain that string can refer to it using only the string's ID. 这要求字符串及其 ID 必须存储在内存中。This requires that the strings and their IDs be stored in memory. 这样，就可以在随后的消息中重新传输 ID，而不是整个字符串。This allows the ID to be retransmitted in subsequent messages instead of the entire string. 这种查找方式会提高使用二进制格式时传输消息的效率。This lookup increases the efficiency of message transmission when using the binary format. 获取和设置可分配用于存储这些字符串的最大内存量。The gets and sets the maximum amount of memory that is allocated to store these strings. ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UE_BinaryMessageEncodingBindingElement#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_binarymessageencodingbindingelement/cs/program.cs#3)] [!code-vb[S_UE_BinaryMessageEncodingBindingElement#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_binarymessageencodingbindingelement/vb/module1.vb#3)]

span.span: The value is less than or equal to zero.

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置最大 XML 编写器数，这些编写器将分配到池中，并随时可以用于处理传出消息。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of XML writers that are allocated to a pool and are ready for use to process outgoing messages.

value.span: 要保留在池中的编写器的最大数量。

span.span: The maximum number of writers to be kept in the pool.

value.span: 默认值为 16 个编写器。

span.span: The default value is 16 writers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 增大此数字将会增加内存消耗，但能够让编码器处理传出消息的突现高峰，因为编码器可以使用池中已创建的编写器，而不必创建新的编写器。Increasing this number increases memory consumption, but prepares the encoder to deal with sudden bursts of outgoing messages because it is able to use writers from the pool that are already created instead of having to create new ones. ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UE_BinaryMessageEncodingBindingElement#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_binarymessageencodingbindingelement/cs/program.cs#4)] [!code-vb[S_UE_BinaryMessageEncodingBindingElement#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_binarymessageencodingbindingelement/vb/module1.vb#4)]

span.span: The value is less than or equal to zero.

summary.span: 获取 XML 消息的复杂性约束，这些消息可由采用此绑定元素配置的终结点进行处理。

span.span: Gets constraints on the complexity of XML messages that can be processed by endpoints configured with this binding element.

value.span: 为交换的 SOAP 消息指定复杂性约束的 。

span.span: The that specifies the complexity constraints on SOAP messages exchanged.

value.span: 下面的备注部分中提供了这些约束的默认值。

span.span: The default values for these constraints are provided in the following remarks section.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这些复杂性约束可以抵御某种类型的拒绝服务 (DOS) 攻击，这些攻击试图利用消息复杂性来占用终结点处理资源。The complexity constraints protect against a class of denial of service (DOS) attacks that attempt to use message complexity to tie up endpoint processing resources. 表达这些约束及其默认值的属性如下所示：The properties that express these constraints and their default values are as follows: - = 32 = 32 - = 8192 = 8192 - = 16384 = 16384 - = 4096 = 4096 - = 16384 = 16384 ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UE_BinaryMessageEncodingBindingElement#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_binarymessageencodingbindingelement/cs/program.cs#6)] [!code-vb[S_UE_BinaryMessageEncodingBindingElement#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_binarymessageencodingbindingelement/vb/module1.vb#6)]
